wikipedia_page.main: Graeme Jonathan Knott  is a British diplomat and has been the British Ambassador to Poland between 2016 and 2020. He also served as the British Ambassador to Hungary between 2012 and 2015.

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Hungary
List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Poland
Consulate-General of the United Kingdom, São Paulo
response: The Consulate General of the United Kingdom in São Paulo is part of the diplomatic mission of the United Kingdom in Brazil. It is located on Rua Ferreira de Araújo, a street in Pinheiros district. The current British Consul General in São Paulo is Jonathan Knott appointed in 2021.
*Graeme Jonathan Knott – H.M. Ambassador, Warsaw, Poland. For services to British foreign policy.
